DOC.brief_summary: This study aim find appropriate dose neostigmine possible reverse rocuronium cisatracurium till train four ( TOF ) 0.9 within 10 minute .
DOC.brief_title: Appropriate Dose Neostigmine Reversal Rocuronium Cisatracurium
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologist Physical status classification 1 2 elective surgery general anesthesia BMI > 25 < 20 kg/m2 Patients take intercurrent medication Glutamic Oxalacetate Transaminase Glutamic Pyruvate Transaminase > 40 IU/L , Cr > 1.4 mg/dl
